TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IChannelDataStore

Docs.summary: Stores channel data for the remoting channels.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Channels that want to use the channel sink architecture must implement this interface on their `ChannelData` object.
## Examples [!code-cpp[IChannelDataStore_Item#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelDataStore_Item/CPP/ichanneldatastore.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IChannelDataStore_Item#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelDataStore_Item/CS/ichanneldatastore.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IChannelDataStore_Item#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelDataStore_Item/VB/ichanneldatastore.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Gets an array of channel URIs to which the current channel maps.
Docs.value: An array of channel URIs to which the current channel maps.
Docs.exception: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.

Docs.param: The key the data object is associated with.
Docs.summary: Gets or sets the data object associated with the specified key for the implementing channel.
Docs.value: The specified data object for the implementing channel.
